casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Russell William TUCKER. No. 113A96-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. John D. Bryson, High Point, Robert L. McClellan, Greensboro, for Tucker. A. Danielle Marquis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th day of September 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Forsyth County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."
